name: Ancient Rome 2
description: Construct entire residential districts for people and improve their well-being by building markets, schools, theaters and other places, and connect them with roads for ease of access.
minimum_requirements: OS: WinXP / Win7 / Win8  / Win10 Processor: 2.0GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 145 MB available space
